text:
pelayanan ramah dan sangat recommend utk menginap bersama keluarga.
 
saat check in diberikan kejutan angpao cokelat utk anak2 dan dipinjemin mainan utk anak2 di kolam renang pas pagi hari nya. (petugas jaga kolam sigap sekali saat menolong seorang anak kecil yg tiba2 melompat ke kolam dewasa, terimakasih pak petugas).

saat breakfast, semua meja makan dihias dengan cantik sesuai suasana imlek.

saat check out, ga hanya staf front office bahkan ada staf yg khusus menanyakan apakah ada keluhan selama menginap.

dan kami sangat berterimakasih atas kejujuran staf hotel. kami sama sekali ga ingat bahwa ada 1 tas yg ketinggalan. pihak hotel yg menghubungi kami. tas beserta isi nya dalam keadaan aman smp kami ambil kembali. terimakasih ya.

kami menginap disini hanya 1 malam (kesini pas liburan imlek 2023) lalu pindah ke hotel lain di daerah teluk betung. Namun, hal yg td sy sampikan hanya sy dapatkan saat menginap di radisson.

yg sangat disayangkan, kami dapat kamar yg smoking room. mngkn krn kami sdh terlalu malam check in nya (jam 8 malam). shg yg tersedia hanya kamar yg smoking room (aroma asap rokok masih tercium). 

overall, nice hotel..
title: Cocok utk stay bersama keluarga

text:
Dari sekian hotel yang pernah kami sekeluarga singgahi di Bandar Lampung, Radisson adalah hotel dengan pengalaman menginap terbaik dan menyenangkan yang pernah kami rasakan. Berawal dari kami mau merayakan hari ulang tahun anak dengan menginap dihotel, Kami ingin mencoba menginap dihotel ini karena belum pernah kami coba sebelumnya. Staff hotel sangat ramah dan melayani kami dengan baik, bahkan ketika mengetahui anak kami berulang tahun, langsung diberi balon dan diberi kue ulang tahun keesokan harinya. Kami upgrade kamar dari superior king ke deluxe king, tapi sayang untuk bednya kami mendapatkan bed twin yang disatukan, karena semua kamar deluxe king sudah penuh, tetapi kami ditawarkan late checkout sebagai penggantinya, dan itu sudah cukup bagi kami.
Hotelnya bersih, kamar sangat bersih dan rapih, protokol kesehatan terjaga dengan baik, internet sangat lancar, breakfastnya enak, dan lumayan beragam. Kolam renang bersih dan menyenangkan disertai adanya playland disampingnya.
Hotel yang sangat direkomendasikan oleh kami jika ingin menginap di Bandar Lampung.
title: Pengalaman menginap terbaik yang ada di Bandar Lampung

text:
Akhirnya saya mencoba hotel baru ini.
1. Untuk lokasi, hotel ini sangat dekat dengan pusat kota dan dempetan langsung dengan mall boemi kedaton jadi bisa dikatakan kalau mau ngemall aman
2. Kamar. Untuk kamar lumayan nyaman dan cukup besar akan tetapi dental kit dan sendal tidak disediakan. Seharusnya bintang 4 sudah memfasilitasi ini. Tetapi pas check in ditawari. Aneh sih, kalau mau efisiensi gak gini juga
3. Untuk moslem, disarankan bawa sarung sendiri karna hotel ini tidak ada dan hanya sajadah yang dapat di pinjam.
4. Fasilitas lumayan lah ada kolam dan gym
5. Untuk resto. Saya mencoba bbrp makanan disini. Banyak menu yang dihidangkan mulai dari dimsum, makanan berat, dll tetapi saya coba bihun dan nasi gorengnya agak krg tapi dagingnya mayan lah. Dimsumnya enak. Sosis, telor standar lah ya dimana2 dan lainnya 
6. Untuk harga termasuk kalangan bintang 4 yang cukup mahal ya tetapi fasilitas dental kit, sendal harus diminta dulu dan sajadah yang tidak ada sama tidak ada acuan arah kiblat
7. Pada saat mau keluar tempat parkirannya bergabung dengan mall akan tetapi motor saya masih tetap di gembok. Bagus sih pengamanannya tapi udh jam check out atau pagi hari harusnya dilepas dan helmnya segera dikembalikan tanpa harus menunggu lama (30 menit) karna menunggu di basement penuh asap bro!
Tolong dipertimbangkan hal seperti ini 

Mungkin itu saja reviewnya
Semoga bermanfaat
title: Staycation di Radisson

text: Ini pengalaman pertama untuk stay di Radisson Lampung Kedaton, saya melihat semua staff sangat ramah dalam menyambut tamu hal ini juga saya dapatkan pada saat pertama kali sampai di depan pintu lobby. Kamar di Radisson Lampung sangat bagus terutama interiornya yang menurut saya sangat unik karena bertemakan adat Lampung, kamar yang sangat bersih dan bagus sangat sayang karena tidak dilengkapi dengan kertas dan alat tulis seperti hotel berbintang lainnya yang pernah saya temukan dan hanya disediakan 1 pasang sandal putih polos untuk dikamar. toilet kamar sangat bersih namun sayang air di tempat buang air kecil dan besar airnya kecil kadang tidak keluar sehingga saya harus menunggu agak lama padahal ini merupakan hotel baru saya sangat tidak nyaman dengan hal ini. Breakfast cukup enak namun makanan tidak banyak macamnya dan jika sudah habis tidak di refill padahal masih waktu breakfast, tidak seperti hotel sebelah yang sama berbintang dengan hotel ini. Saya juga meminta laundry bag kepada petugas melalui telepon namun saya tidak diberikan juga sampai waktu check-out yang akhirnya saya meminta langsung kepada petugas yang sedang membersihkan kamar di sebelah kamar saya. Tapi secara keseluruhan hotel baru ini sangat nyaman karena suasananya yang tenang dan saya juga suka karenan langsung terkoneksi dengan mall Bumi Kedaton sehingga untuk mencari makanan tidak sulit.

text:
Meninap di radisson melalui pemesanan tiket. Com
Tgl 4 check in mencoba superior room nya.. 
Krg ada keterangan jelas mengenai ketentuan menginap bagi keluarga membawa anak2.. Saya membawa anak umur 6 dan 11 tahun.. 
Ketika Check in saya diberitahu bahwa anak saya harus pakai extra bed saya oke,  namun tyt hal tsb tidak bisa dilakukan dlm 1 kamar,  maka saya diminta buka kamar 1 lagi untuk anak saya..  Agak tercengang,  krn di hotel berbintang 4 lain saya biasa paling cuma menambah xtra bed untuk anak saya yg besar saja. Tp krn sudah check in,tpaksa saya booked 1 kamar tambahan..  Ketika masuk kamar tyt tidak ada sikat gigi,  bkn kah itu hal umum bagi hotel bintang 4..
Kl mnr standar hotel plg tidak sikat gigi,  sampo dan sabun ada..  
Ini ada conditioner,  sabun muka,  body lotion tp tidak ada sikat gigi di kamar superior..  
Hotel bintang 3 aja ada sikat gigi... 
Check in sangat lama prosesnya padahal hotel tidak ramai.. 
Anak2 diberi minuman yoghurt dan kinder joy, ada welcome drinknya jg cm agak blakangan keluarnya..  
Akses ke mall memang oke sich,  kolam jg bersih,  pilihan makan breakfast sedikit bila dibanding hotel bintang 4 lainnya..  
Ini review saya buat kamar superiornya.. 
Semoga ke dpn nya bisa lebih jelas ya aturan kamarnya terutama untuk anak2..
title: Sedikit kecewa

It has come to my attention regarding the slow check-in process, dental kit in room and breakfast food variety. text:
How can I review at tripadvisor? I booked at agoda for this hotel, 2 adult each room, 2 rooms for 3 nights with breakfast. The booking and invoice my booking include breakfast. But when I arrived I've been told my booking id only include 1person breakfast each room. 

Totally agoda and hotel fault where they displayed price and details details just go wrong.. 

Except that:

Positive:
New hotel
Good design
Beside mall

Negative:
1. Bad hospitality, i never experienced like this before when I traveling local and international. Totally their fault but customer have to dealt with it. 
2. Poor sound proof room, I can easily hear people walking and talking on the alley, and hear voice from the next door. 
3. Inside room design only for 1 person like. Sandal, tooth brush, you have to ask more.. Normally in other hotel everything prepared for two persons
4. Poor quality bathroom glass, make you bathing experience really bad. When you go out from shower the glass door hit so hard the glass.. It could be blunder if its broken, cust have to pay. 
5. Poor attitude from the employee when we talking to them, for example in the swimming pool area. 
He asked my room number with high intonations. Like we dont stayed here. I found out that this swimming pool sent for commercial for 150k.
6. Spider web on the corner of ceiling 

Be careful when booking from agoda and stay in this hotel
title: Unprofessional hotel booking

owner_response.text:

We do apologize for the confusion with the room booking as our rates are occupancy based pricing based on the number of guests staying, this is merely to cater to both our business and family market demand. 

Once again, we apologize for the inconvenience caused and we look forward to having you back here with an enhanced experience awaits!

Best Regards,
Yann Marteau

I've been staying in Radisson Lampung since they just opened on 2019. It's start as an exclusive stay (as with Radisson standard) which is very convenient with a connection to the mall (MBK). But now the hotel is just almost always too crowded, I know it's good for the business, but it doesn't feel comfortable anymore with so many people around in the lobby, the noise from the room, the queue for hotel's facility such as swimming pool and restaurant. The worst part is on the breakfast time when lots of people have to be turned back since the restaurant is always full of capacity. They are trying their best by extending the breakfast time, but I guess something should be done so it could accommodate people who come at the busiest breakfast hours (7-9 am).

Anyhow, their room is still clean and comfortable, the staffs are always impeccably friendly and helpful. Special thanks to Bima - concierge who was really helpful and support me with airport pick up and transportation, by maintaining his diligent and amazing attitude eventhough it's already late at night, and with horrible traffics. Kudos for you!
For Jeannie with her friendly personality and hospitality during my stay there

I'll still come back to Radisson whenever I come to Bandar Lampung, but I really hope they could bring their exclusiveness standard back to how Radisson is.
title: Amazing hospitality

owner_response.text:

Your recognition of our team's effort, in particular Bima and Jannie is greatly appreciated and it keeps us motivated in our ongoing effort to deliver memorable moment to each of our guests.

We look forward to having you back here with an enhanced experience awaits!

Best Regards,

General Manager

text:
My son had a medical emergency in Sumatra and I travelled  to be with him - we spent a week at the Radisson before he was fit to fly home to Australia.
The staff at the Radisson welcomed us and treated us like family. What was a very scary week for us turned into a wonderful experience and has left us with a beautiful memory of this time.
Jannie at reception was there for us from the minute we arrived. Nothing was too hard for her , she was there for anything we needed - thankyou Jannie.
At breakfast each day Lela looked after us and made us feel so welcome - we looked forward to seeing her each day.
And at dinner the lovely Zayad served us each night and had great conversations - he even offered to show us around Lampung on his day off but unfortunately we were leaving before that.
The hotel is of excellent standards, very very clean, excellent food, and staff available to assist at any time.
I’m not sure that we would be in Sumatra again but we would absolutely recommend the Radisson to anyone visiting Lampung.
Thanks again, Michaela & Arch Whiteman
title: emergency stay Lampung

text:
I would say this is possibly the most popular, well designed, cleanest, and organized hotel in Lampung. The staff were trained well, responsive, polite, understanding and attentive. The rooms were spacious (we had the standard room), fitting two medium sized suitcases, good internet connection and clean. My mother has mobility issues and they could find a plastic chair for her to use in the shower easily. 
Note that getting a connecting room need to be done through phone - it is not available online, However your membership benefits extend here and are honored throughout.
Breakfast areas are good, good selection of food. They are a bit struggling with the number of people (we came during the hari Raya Eid period) but the staff made sure that they notify us and look for seats quickly.
The gym (not pictured) is my favorite - its very well equipped and that picture you see of a dedicated spinning studio is actually there (as pictured)! 
the only downside about this hotel is the staycationing locals. They are the majority of the hotel guests during the Raya period. During my stay; we had families running up and down the corridor with their kids; 5-10 year old kids using the gym as a playground, very messy breakfast tables and rowdy crowds. The staff remained professional at this time; and its good to see they try their best too take control of the situation and notify the rowdy guests.
I would definitely come here again, as this seems to be the best choice to stay in Lampung, The proximity of the mall helps too!
title: Best hotel to stay in Lampung

text: Had a rough start due to late check in and we were told that the room was being cleaned and sanitized. We initially asked for an early check in and they we’re supposed to call us if a room became available before 3. We came in at 3 but the room wasn’t ready till 4.30. But they made it up for the rest of the visit. The staff were so attentive and helpful. They gave us a discounted rate for the rest of the stay. They were able to accommodate our request for early breakfast on our wedding day and decorated our room when we came back in the evening! We ended up booking an extra room for my in laws and they were able to let them check in 2 hrs early without extra fee. Overall it was a great stay and we’d definitely come back to stay at Radisson for our future trip to Bandar Lampung.
title: Great stay

text:
This was my third stays in Radisson Lampung, during my visit to Lampung. Over all was a great stay. On my last staycation, there a few hiccups : 
First at swimming pool, a few people was not wearing a proper swimming costume, just t’shirt and short plus some wear full clothes with hijab when swimming and the staffs plus security didn’t do anything just standing there watching.  Fyi, when my nephews didn’t bring they swimming costume, I went down to the mall which is attached to the hotel bought the costume as the hotel rule was clear anyone have to swim with a proper swimming costume. 
During breakfast, the restaurant was full. Maybe is best to break into 2-3 sessions in the future to avoid over crowded people which is unpleasant. 
The safe deposit in the room never works.
title: Weekend Staycation

text: I stayed for almost two weeks and have no complaint! Room is nice, clean, has a good space too. The overall hotel ambience is also great, with a modern eclectic touch. What makes the stay memorable is the great hospitality from the staff, very helpful and friendly. I became familiar with Jannie & Rabani, whom I always meet at the restaurant and 9th floor. They always check in to make sure I got everything I need :) Don't worry about the health protocols, the body temperature is always checked, you can find the sanitizer dispenser in every corner. Plus, this hotel has a great location, it's also connected to a mall. You can also find a lot of great food around. So if you come to Lampung, Radisson is def a great choice.
title: Clean, modern, great hospitality & location!

text:
The hotel is conveniently located near the biggest mall in town, with a number of restaurants and shops near by. The staff is friendly and courteous, and the hotel has a modern design with a tasteful local touch. The quality of the food was good, both at the restaurant for lunches and dinners and in the breakfast buffet. unfortunately I had a number of issues that made my stay unpleasant. 

The hotel was running a construction project on the 9th floor, where my room was located. the project work ran daily from early in the morning to as late as 9PM. When I called to complain the first time, the response I got from the front office agent was "this is an important project, I can't call it off, and need to check with my supervisor". This clearly showed that they don't care about their customers' experience, and to them construction work this late at night seemed acceptable. After waiting for 30 minutes with no change I complained again. It took another 3p minutes for the team finally looked into it and stopped the work. However, no apologies where made and no one called to check. The next morning I had the same unfortunate problem, when I complained again it seemed the staff was unsure what to do! so I suggested they move me to another floor, which they did. The new room wasn't clean unfortunately. There were stains on the bed sheets and pillows, and the floor wasn't vacuumed which was evident by the many food crumbs all over. A front office manager reached out based on my request, and though was apologetic. she gave the most ridiculous excuses and topped it off by attempting to compensate the bad experience with a lame and uninteresting late checkout offer. The next day, I wasn't able to get back to my room a couple of times due to issues with their card scanning system once and due to an issue with the 5th floor door the second time. 

Its clear this hotel has lots of potential, and its unfortunate its not being fully taken advantage of due to inconsistencies in the performance of front office and house keeping staff. I highly suggest that management invests more in training their staff, and focus on raising the quality bar in their property.
title: Spotting Experience

text:
In this time of the COVID-19 pandemic, implementing health protocols is very important. The Radisson Lampung hotel did very well. When entering the hotel lobby until check-out, they never forget to apply health protocols. The hotel rooms are clean and to reduce exposure, the room service menu book and TV channels are not in paper but hotel guests are given a barcode that can be scanned on the TV screen of each room.
Each hotel guest is confirmed whether his breakfast is delivered to the room or to the restaurant. If you want breakfast at the restaurant, the hotel staff will ask you what time you plan on having breakfast to prevent the crowds at breakfast.
We highly recommend this hotel if you want to stay overnight during the COVID-19 pandemic
title: Good experience at Radisson Lampung

text:
I stayed here for a night on family trip to Lampung. Hotel location is very strategic. It has door access to Mall Bumi Kedaton, make us easier to find meals when we dont like to eat outside or going by car/vehicle. We can find hotel location on google map or Waze application easily, so we wont miss the way. 

The hotel staff was very good. They helped the guests politely, especially on breakfast venue. Hotel facilities were OK, may be because the hotel is new.  They have swimmimg pool on 5th floor. We can use towel from the pool for free. It was clean and nice pool. 

For higher floor access we can use 4 lifts. We can find helping phone in front of the lift, so we can call for help easily. 

They served various menu on breakfast. From Asian to European style. They served Lampung coffee also. 

But I dont like the parking area. It was very confusing for new guest.
title: Family Day at Radisson Lampung

text:
Mijn vriendin en ik gingen naar Lampung om na ruim 1 week haar 1e kleinkind en zoon, schoondochter enz te ontmoeten. 
Het 1e hotel waar we zaten voldeed niet aan onze verwachtingen en gingen we op zoek naar iets anders.
We kwamen bij  Radisson ook omdat er een mall aan vast zit.
Wat een ontvangst, geweldig, eerst een kamer bekijken en hoe mooi schoon alles was. In Blanda ( Nederland)  zouden we zeggen dat je van de vloer kon eten.  Hebben  we niet uitgeprobeerd, maar wel geboekt voor 14 dagen.
Iedere dag kon je je bed laten verschonen en anders deden zij dat om de 3 dagen. De kamer met douche en toilet werd iedere dag schoon gemaakt, geen stofje gezien of ongedierte. 
Het ontbijt was grandioos, indonesisch, westers, broodjes, echt verrukkelijk en koffie, ook Eu. 
We hebben een paar keer ook een diner gehad, echt goed hoor.
Daarnaast hebben we een Chinees buffet gehad en een week later, toen de familie er ook was, werden we uitgenodigd voor een Indonesisch buffet. Zo heerljjk. Ook echt klaargemaakt door goede koks.
De familie kon ook een kamer krijgen en we kregen pasjes zodat we bij elkaar op de etage konden komen, wel zo gemakkelijk ook omdat we met elkaar optrekken. 
Bij het ontbijt was er soms niet een grotere tafel beschikbaar vanwege drukte, werd er een aangrenzend kamertje geopend zodat wij gezamenlijk konden ontbijten.
Het was ook heerlijk zwemmen  handoeken kreeg je er gewoon en de milkshakes waren zo lekker.
En de vriendelIjkheid van het personeel is echt geweldig.
Ik wil de hostesses M.J. en Jannie even  bedanken, maar eigenlijk staan ze voor het voltallige personeel dat erg goed hun werk deed on het ons naar de zin te maken.
We hebben een geweldige tijd gehad in het hotel en met de familie en in het byzonder  de 1e kleinzoon Ray ( 3 maand oud).
Radisson bedankt voor de fijne tijd.
Tot ziens.

Groeten van Henk en Grace.
Kamer 928.
title: Een geweldig hotel

Best Regards,

text: Wir waren schon zum 2x jetzt im Radisson Kedaton Lampung. Die Zimmer sind modern aber dennoch mit traditionellen Elementen eingerichtet. Der Service der Mitarbeiter ist wirklich hervorragend.Angefangen von der Rezeption über den Roomservice bis zu den Mitarbeitern am Pool. Da muss man noch Arthur erwähnen ein Mitarbeiter vom Restaurant/ Poolteam . Er hat uns sogar im strömenden Regen auf unseren Liegen mit Regenschirm unserer Essen serviert . Auch die Betten der Zimmer sind wirklich super bequem . Auch der direkte Zugang zur Mall ist definitiv ein Plus. Alles in allem ist das Radisson Kedaton eins der besten in Lampung .
title: Super Hotel Top Service
